name: SystolicBloodPressureGreaterThanEqualTo140
title: Systolic Blood Pressure Greater Than Equal To 140
description: Name change from "Systolic BP >=140 Most Recent, G8753".  Add CPT Level II codes.  Add inactive HCPCS codes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Most recent systolic blood pressure >= 140),(Data Element Scope: Representative systolic blood pressure >= 140),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that represent only a systolic blood pressure >= 140),(Exclusion Criteria: Diastolic blood pressure codes, codes that represent both a systolic and diastolic reading)
